name: Amazoness Hot Spring
text: When this card is activated: You can take 1 "Amazoness" monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or (if it is a Pendulum Monster) place it in your Pendulum Zone. When you take battle damage while you control an "Amazoness" Monster Card: You can gain LP equal to the damage you took. You can only use this effect of "Amazoness Hot Spring" once per turn.
